# Annotation
## Bioconductor


### Packages
org. ....
```{r eval = F}
BiocManager::install('org.Mm.eg.db')

library(org.Mm.eg.db)
```

### 1. Get key types
```{r eval = F}
keytypes(org.Mm.eg.db)
```

### 2. Select function
- there are other select functions (dplyr), watch out!
```{r eval = F}
AnnotationDbi::select(
  org.Mm.eg.db,
  keys = df$ensembl_id,
  columns = 'ENZYME',
  keytype = 'ENSEMBL'
)
```


### GO annotation example
```{r eval = F}
library(org.Mm.eg.db)
library(readxl)

df <- read_excel('./data/DESeq2_Aged_Young.xlsx')

goannot <- AnnotationDbi::select(
  org.Mm.eg.db,
  keys = as.character(df_univ$Ensembl_ID),
  columns = 'GO',
  keytype = 'ENSEMBL'
)
```


- advantage: offline  useable
